data.title: Beasley Media Group, LLC
data.text:
Naples, Florida (March 26, 2018): Beasley Media Group, LLC is proud to announce that Vice President of Digital Operations, Kimberly Sonneborn, has been selected as a mentee for the 2018 MIW Group Mildred Carter Mentoring Program. Beasley Media Group, LLC is the lead sponsor of this year’s program. “It is an honor to support the MIW Radio Group’s mission of […]

Naples, Florida (3/21/18): Beasley Media Group, LLC; a subsidiary of Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: BBGI) announces Jack Daniel has been named as the new Afternoon On-Air Personality on K 104.7 and 94.7 SMOKE (3-7pm) in Charlotte, North Carolina. He will begin his new position on Monday, April 2, 2018.

[et_pb_section bb_built=\”1\”][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=\”4_4\”][et_pb_text] March is National Women\’s History Month and Beasley Media Group, LLC is celebrating all the women in our company who do their Beasley Best each and every day.

DETROIT, MI (March 6, 2018): Beasley Media Group, LLC, a subsidiary of Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: BBGI) announces the return of the 2nd Annual 94.7 WCSX-FM’s St. Patrick’s Day “Shamrockin’ In Mt Clemens” Street Party. The event will take place on Saturday, March 17th beginning at 10 am until 9 pm on Macomb Place

Naples, Florida (March 7, 2018): Beasley Media Group, LLC, a subsidiary of Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc., announces Jeff Kurkjian has been named as the new weekday Morning Host from 6-10am on 102.7 The Coyote in Las Vegas. He will be joined by Aimee Montgomery, who will shift from her current role as Midday personality on

LOS ANGELES – March 06, 2018 — Triton Digital®, the global technology and services leader to the digital audio and podcast industry, today announced that Beasley Media Group, a subsidiary of Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc., has renewed and expanded its relationship with Triton Digital to power the delivery, measurement, and monetization of their streaming audio

NAPLES, Florida, March 1, 2018 – Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: BBGI) (“the Company”), a large- and mid-size market radio broadcaster, announced today that Chief Financial Officer, Marie Tedesco, will be participating in the Deutsche Bank Media, Telecom & Business Services Conference held at The Breakers Hotel in Palm Beach, Florida. NAPLES, Florida, March 2, 2018 – Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: BBGI) (“the Company”), a large- and mid-size market radio broadcaster, announced today that its Board of Directors approved an 11.1 percent increase in the quarterly cash dividend to $0.05 per share of its Class A and Class B common stock beginning with the dividend
